game.name: Apokalyx
game.description:
The world has now transformed into a strange place. Being a gladiator, you have to take charge and come forward to fight for your glory, money, and freedom, of course.

One of the best fighting activities to be engaged in, Apokalyx is a widely popular action game offering a wonderful opportunity to become the ruler of your land. An unknown cataclysm called the Apokalyx has ended the entire world. Using the deep underground shelters, only a few lucky people survived. Others got succeed to hide in that areas that were not touched by the cataclysm yet.

Many of such people thought that the cataclysm was the Nature rebellion and re-learned how to live in that world. Not all the human beings that were captured in the cataclysm lived happily: the powerful ones survived, with a think that it was an imperative step in the evolution of entire mankind.

Since you are in the category of rogue groups, so you have to combat against the enemies for total domination. You are free to select between the three surviving groups and fight it out in order to get yourself involved in the dominant species in this flash action game. You can choose a class and then go forward towards setting the points at the beginning to create your own character in this free online game.

This action game is full of fancy weapons and armor that are sure to give you huge thrill and fun. Play this latest fighting game with the open mind and prove your value in the arena after becoming the ruler of your land.
